data.title: Fully Funded Scholarships in Poland - OYA Opportunities
data.meta_description: Apply for Fully Funded Scholarships at Jan Dlugosz University in Poland. The deadline for this application is 31st August 2021. Jan Dlugosz
data.text:
Jan Dlugosz University in partnership with the Polish Government is granting theÂ Maintenance Grant for international applicants for the academic year 2021-2022.Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Also, the award is to all international students by Jan Dlugosz University in the form of a maintenance grant. The program is monitored and sponsored by the Polish Government and will provide the selected students financial assistance.

Public university, The Jan Dlugosz University in Czestochowa, is ranked 79th in the country. Its vision is to carry outÂ scientific and didactic activities through the conduct of authentic scientific research.

Additionally, why choose to study at Jan Dlugosz University? Jan Dlugosz University is a university with traditions related to pedagogical education and conducts forms of practical training, while dynamically developing university courses and creating an increasingly rich and comprehensive teaching offer. Likewise, JDU has a consistent policy of improving the quality of education.
